lines.text: She did not leave me. We parted.
Is that why you're mad at the world?
I'm not mad a the world, just a very small part of it.
No! How can I be hurt? I just threw my family jewels full force against a freezing metal fence!
Oh good, as long as you're not hurt
When I was a little girl I could tell the breed of a dog by its bark.
So, you two met at the store?
First floor. Handbags. It was very romantic. Bert dragged me right off, I couldn't resist!
All the good songs have already been written.
Well, no one has ever written a song about me!
